taken from http://sawja.inria.fr/, version 2.2.2

Renamed uppercase files like README, INSTALL, COPYRIGHT etc.
configure now checks for camlzip 1.05 (not 1.04).
Removed for-pack. 
The 'make clean' now also removed javalib.*

Created src/jClassLow.ml
Created from scratch src/Makefile
Added some ;_ in record patterns.
